line.token: * Precondition : There can only be 1 default option
"number between 0 = 0% and 1 = 100% (e.g. 0.05 would add 5 cents to every dollar ordered)."
"e.g. entering 10 will add a fixed 10 dollars (or whatever currency is being used) delivery fee."
"it multiplies the total weight of the total order with this number to work out charge for delivery. NOTE: you can also setup weight brackets (e.g. from 0 - 1kg = $123, from 1kg - 2kg = $456)."
"if you enter 0.1 here, the price will go up with every 100 grams of total order weight."
"if this option is selected and the total order is over the amounted entered above then delivery is free."
"if this option is selected and the total order is less than the amount entered above then delivery is free. This is for situations where a small order would have a large delivery cost."
* if none exists, it creates one.
* returns an array of countries available for all options combined.
* @todo: Auto completer may not be functioning correctly: ExactMatchFilter does not accept EcommerceCountryFilters_AllowSales as modifiers
* make sure there is only exactly one default

* make sure all are unique codes
